summary: Live Demo Analytics feature testing complete. All major features verified working: Demo Analytics tab appears in main navigation after LIVE DEMO tab, purple/orange theme distinguishes from teal/gold Trading Analytics, header shows 'Live Demo Analytics' with 'MANAGER CANDIDATE EVALUATION DASHBOARD' subtitle, DEMO ACCOUNTS badge with orange pulsing dot, KPI Strip with demo-specific data, all 4 tabs (Portfolio Overview, Manager Rankings, Deep Dive, AI Advisor) functional, data separation verified - no overlap between demo and real accounts.

issues: AI Insights takes several seconds to load, showing 'Analyzing portfolio...' loading state - this is expected behavior for AI generation

critical_code_review_comments: LiveDemoAnalytics.js follows same structure as NextGenTradingAnalytics.js with proper CSS prefix (--lda-) separation
API endpoint /api/admin/live-demo-analytics/managers correctly filters by account_type='live_demo'
AI Advisor endpoints (/chat, /insights, /allocation) properly scoped to demo accounts
Data separation fully verified - no overlap between demo accounts (2210, 2215, 2216, 20062, 2217) and real accounts (897589, 885822, 897591, 886602, 886557)
Purple (#A855F7) and orange (#F97316) accent colors properly distinguish from teal (#00D4AA) and gold (#FFB800)
seed_data_creation: None - using existing live_demo accounts from MongoDB
context_for_next_testing_agent: Live Demo Analytics feature fully tested. 5 demo accounts found: GOLD DAY TRADING (#2210), JOEL ALVES NASDAQ (#2215), JOEL ALVES GOLD (#2216), CRYPTO BITCOIN (#20062), UNO14 (#2217). All accounts have account_type='live_demo'. Data is completely separate from Trading Analytics (real accounts: 897589, 885822, 897591, 886602, 886557).

navigation.demo_analytics_tab: ✅ Appears in main navigation after LIVE DEMO tab
navigation.tab_position: ✅ Between LIVE DEMO and Broker Rebates tabs

demo_badge.visible: ✅ DEMO ACCOUNTS badge with orange pulsing dot

portfolio_overview_tab.fund_allocation_chart: ✅ Pie chart showing DEMO fund allocation
portfolio_overview_tab.risk_profile_chart: ✅ Radar chart with Sharpe Ratio, Sortino Ratio, Win Rate, Profit Factor, Risk Control

manager_rankings_tab.strategy_leaderboard: ✅ Table with RANK, STRATEGY, FUND, AUM, P&L, RETURN, SHARPE, WIN RATE, MAX DD, RISK, COMPARE
manager_rankings_tab.risk_badges: ✅ LOW RISK, MEDIUM, HIGH RISK badges

deep_dive_tab.manager_details: ✅ Shows Initial Allocation, Current Equity, Total P&L, Profit Withdrawals

ai_advisor_tab.ai_insights: ✅ Shows '# DEMO PORTFOLIO EVALUATION' - demo-specific context
ai_advisor_tab.allocation_advisor: ✅ Capital input and Risk Tolerance dropdown
ai_advisor_tab.chat_interface: ✅ Claude Sonnet 4.5 badge and suggestion buttons

data_separation.no_overlap: ✅ VERIFIED - No accounts appear in both demo and real analytics
